title: Hi, I'm Kismath, a problem solver, a dreamer, and a developer.
quickDescription: Looking to bring innovation to your next project? Let's create something great together. Here, I present my varied projects, demonstrating my versatility, rigor and ability to create captivating user experiences.

frontend.title: Frontend development
frontend.description: I create responsive, user-friendly websites that are both visually appealing and functional. I use modern technologies like React, Vuejs with Typescript to build interactive web applications that provide a seamless user experience.

backend.title: Backend development
backend.description: I build scalable, secure and efficient backend systems using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I have experience in building RESTful APIs, GraphQL APIs, and microservices.

testing.title: Testing
testing.description: I am still a beginner in testing, but I have experience in writing unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests using Jest, Mocha, and Cypress.
